entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Shamattawa
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 24 March 2023
